Package froggerGameActions

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    GameAction
    The base frame class for all kinds of Game Actions in Frogger Game
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    GameActionContext
    This class will refer and execute a type of GameAction
     Strategy Design Pattern is applied here.
    PopHighScore
    Represents one of the Game Actions.
    Retrieves and Pops the High Score of Frogger Game.
    UpdateLife
    Represents one of the Game Actions.
    Update the latest amount of Life Animal has.
    UpdateScore
    Represents one of the Game Actions.
    Update the latest scores (via Digit) of Animal.
    UpLevel
    Represents one of the Game Actions.
    Level Up
